cite: Daw, N. D., O'Doherty, J. P., Dayan, P., Seymour, B., & Dolan, R. J. (2006). Cortical substrates for exploratory decisions in humans. Nature, 441(7095), 876-879.

data_columns.subjID: A unique identifier for each subject in the data-set.
data_columns.choice: Integer value representing the option chosen on the given trial: 1, 2, 3, or 4.
data_columns.outcome: Integer value representing the outcome of the given trial (where reward == 1, and loss == -1).

mu0.desc: anticipated initial mean of all 4 options

sigma0.desc: anticipated initial sd (uncertainty factor) of all 4 options
